It's hard to get luxury items during wartime. Everything is rationed.

Take cosmetics, for example. Castanica has shortages of the stuff all the time. Did you know you can make mascara out of the hooves of the {@LinkCreature:10#9#longtusk slashers} along Boan Strand?

If someone brought me hooves, I'm sure we could turn a tidy profit.
Yeah, these are perfect. I thank you, and the ladies of Castanica—and many of the men—thank you, too.
You know how the castanics like their eye makeup, <PCNAME>. Gathering the hooves of some {@LinkCreature:10#9#longtusk slashers} could be profitable for us both.
